channel.title: What month was the best for packs in your opinion?
channel.description: To tell you the truth this has been the best month for instruments, I mean common risers and Scream leads, awesome! What month do you think was the best for packs?

item.title: What month was the best for packs in your opinion?

item.description:

item.title: What month was the best for packs in your opinion?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
October 2018… because there wasn’t anything! spoiler

In all seriousness I think my best pack month was March 2018, with the introduction of Orchestral Strings. I don’t even remember the drum pack that came out but the strings were a huge game changer in many ways. It really broadened the picture for Auxy, and I think that importance made it the best.

Read full topic
